Title: IMS Covid-19
Description:
This is a native mobile app available for iOS and Android to track the numbers for COVID-19 in the whole world.
Install by opening the the following link in your phone

iOS: Install iOS

Android: Install Android

Title: XClient App
Description: This is an Inventory Management Web Application that i developed using AngularJS, Spring MVC and MySQL.

Title: Video Tour Web App
Description:
A video web application for a tourism start-up integrated with Youtube to manage the company’s Youtube channel and videos.

Features like: register account, login with remember me, forgot my password feature, logout, delete account, give and withdrawn permissions, add video, remove video, watch youtube videos and other channel management features integrated.

Link to the Application: https://videotour.herokuapp.com. Heroku free tier sleeps, so you might have to wait 1 minute or 2 to access.

Title: Barganho v0.1
Description: Back Office application with REST API for an Android/IOS Mobile App in which was built in Spring-MVC , MySQL and AngularJS/Bootstrap, it's full-featured with user registration, login, password change and recovery, e-mail confirmation and all CRUD functionality for the different entities as well as an Admin Management Dashboard.

Title: Barganho v1
Description:
This is a new version of the Barganho Back Office Web Application, now with a Landing Page to present the Company, App and Services.

Full featured with User Account Management, Data Analytics, Data Layer Interface that is pluggable meaning it is possible to change Database software easily.

Tech stack: NodeJS/Firebase/Express/Express Session Angular 7
